name: strongly
posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

dsense.name: strongly
dsense.posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

trans_examp.trans_en: very much or in a very serious way

example.eg: They strongly believe their children should make choices for themselves.
example.egtrans: 他们坚信应该由孩子们自己来选择。

example.eg: Many locals are strongly opposed to the development.
example.egtrans: 许多当地居民强烈反对这项地产开发。

dsense.name: strongly
dsense.posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

trans_examp.trans_en: in a way or form that is difficult to break

example.eg: Equipment will have to be strongly made to endure the weather conditions on the ice cap.
example.egtrans: 设备必须制造得非常坚固，才能经受住冰盖上的天气条件。
